Official website of La Legiun Straniera, a cozy holiday home nestled in the hills of Fontanelle di Boves (CN), Italy.

Built using the Namecheap Page Builder, the project was developed under a minimal budget but with maximum attention to aesthetics and accessibility. The site features a clean layout, multilingual support (IT/EN/FR), and clear sections for guests to explore the location, discover the rooms, and access external booking platforms.
